T02TD2788E:154a-0: @154a * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2788E:154a-1: lte dbus las skyes byi ru padma r'a ga'i mdog can ram //
T02TD2788E:154a-2: snying gnas 'ongs kha ba dung ltar dkar ba'i bdud rtsi hr'i: //
T02TD2788E:154a-3: smin mtshams las brgyud aindra mkha' 'dra'i thig le'i rgyal po aa //
T02TD2788E:154a-4: gtum mo rnams kyis kam bsreg nri sbyong thig le mchog gso rgyal //
T02TD2788E:154a-5: re zhig byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog la rab gzhol bas//
T02TD2788E:154a-6: sems ni gcig tu rnam par nges gi nga g-yengs par ma gyur pa //
T02TD2788E:154a-7: 'gro ba lnga po rnams la byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang //
T02TD2788E:154a-8: btang snyoms byang chub kyi sems yang dag par bsgoms pa dag gis skye bo gdul bar dka' ba ma rungs pa tha dad pa dmu rgod du gyur pas //
T02TD2788E:154a-9: rgyud ma rungs par byas pa rnams kyi khro ba bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD2788E:154a-10: gang phyir srid pa'i sdug bsngal rtsa //
T02TD2788E:154a-11: nyon mongs de ye rtse phyir dang //
T02TD2788E:154a-12: bsod nams mang po gzhig phyir dang //
T02TD2788E:154a-13: bdag la brten nas gzhan brlag phyir //
T02TD2788E:154a-14: de la bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba'i gnas ni /
T02TD2788E:154b-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam @154b par dkar ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-3: spyan ni rab tu mang pa'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-4: spu re re zhing yang 'od kyi zer glog gi me lta bu rnam par 'phro ba'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-5: sgron shing dang tshil chen po'i mar me la dbyes pa'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-6: aa ku ru dang tu ru ska dang /
T02TD2788E:154b-7: gla rtsi'i bdug pas yang dag par bdug pa'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-8: tshes gcig dang gsum dang bdun la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-9: tshes brgyad dang bzhi dang bco lnga la rgyun gyi sbyor ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-10: bcu drug dang bco brgyad dang gnam stong la sreg pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-11: gcig dang gsum dang bdun dang ni //
T02TD2788E:154b-12: brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga dang //
T02TD2788E:154b-13: bcu drug bco brgyad gnam stong la //
T02TD2788E:154b-14: byis pa'i ston mo grangs rim bzhin //
T02TD2788E:154b-15: 'di ni zla ba dang po la'o //
T02TD2788E:154b-16: de nas rim bzhin yang phyi mar //
T02TD2788E:154b-17: mas bzlog grangs kyi bud med ston //
T02TD2788E:154b-18: de bzhin de phyir ci 'byor mchod //
T02TD2788E:154b-19: tshul 'dis sprul gdug nag po yang //
T02TD2788E:154b-20: lcags bsregs snod du mar gsar bzhin //
T02TD2788E:154b-21: ring por mi thogs snying brtse can //
T02TD2788E:154b-22: zhu bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02TD2788E:154b-23: khro ba bsal ba rdzogs so//
